summary.para: Enumerates the bands in a band site.

param.name: uBand
param.para: Type: UINT
Call the method with this parameter starting at 0 to begin enumerating. If this parameter is -1, the pdwBandID parameter is ignored and this method returns the count of the bands in the band site.

param.name: pdwBandID
param.para: Type: DWORD*
The address of a band ID variable that receives the band ID.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM-defined error code for errors. If the first parameter is -1, the count of the bands in the band site is returned.

summary.para: Gets information about a band in a band site.

param.name: dwBandID
param.para: Type: DWORD
The ID of the band object to query.

param.name: ppstb
param.para: Type: **
Address of an interface pointer that, when this method returns successfully, points to the IDeskBand object that represents the band. This value can be NULL.

param.name: pdwState
param.para: Type: DWORD*

Pointer to a DWORD value that, when this method returns successfully, receives the state of the band object. This state is a combination of BSSF_VISIBLE, BSSF_NOTITLE, and BSSF_UNDELETEABLE. See for more information on those flags. This value can be NULL if the state information is not needed.

param.name: pszName
param.para: Type: LPWSTR
Pointer to a buffer of cchName Unicode characters that, when this method returns successfully, receives the name of the band object.

param.name: cchName
param.para: Type: int
The size of the pszName buffer, in characters.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
